message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a competitive price of $120. I believe it offers excellent value, even at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90 for the product?
I understand your desire to save, Bob, but $90 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95 for the product?
